levels.description:
Immediately heals self by <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of ATK; afterwards, Attack Interval <@ba.vup>slightly reduces</>
<@ba.rem>Skill activation grants 31 ammo and the skill ends when all ammo is used (Can manually deactivate skill); Can only be used 3 times per deployment</>
